name: es6require
description: Require ES6 modules into ES5 modules.

scripts.compile: rm -rf dist/* && babel --modules common src --out-dir dist && uglifyjs dist/* -c -m -o dist/*
scripts.debug: rm -rf dist/* && babel --source-maps-inline --modules common src --out-dir dist
scripts.test: npm run debug && babel-node test/main.js | tap-spec

author: jacob@webnuts.com
